# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- Always align XAML `x:Class`/namespace (Views.* and ViewModels.*).
- Include MaterialDesign `xmlns` when using `PackIcon`.
- Use existing Color resources (e.g., `AccentBlue` instead of `PrimaryColor`).
- Avoid `StackPanel` Spacing; use `Margin` instead.
- Wrap `Button` content in a `StackPanel` to prevent multiple Content assignments.
